mapper.select: select p.productid productid,p.name productname,p.price price ,s.sub_name subname,m.main_name mainname,s.sub_id,s.main_id from product p,sub_category s, main_category m where p.sub_id=s.sub_id and s.main_id = m.main_id

select p.productid productid,p.name productname ,p.price price ,p.status status,p.th_img,p.info_img,p.inputdate inputdate ,s.sub_name subname,m.main_name mainname,i.product_img prdImg from product p,sub_category s,main_category m,product_img i where p.productid=i.productid(+) and p.sub_id = s.sub_id(+) and s.main_id=m.main_id(+) and p.productid =#{p.productid}
